ValidationRule.description: Restricts edits to GBS Cases from the submitter of the record
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), OR( ISCHANGED(Status), ISCHANGED( RecordTypeId ) ), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "GBS Management", $Profile.Name <> "GBS Analyst", $Profile.Name <> "CS Management", $Profile.Name <> "CS Coordinator", RecordType.Name <> "OTC - Bailment", RecordType.Name <> "OTC - Bailment Error", OR( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "OTC "), CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "GMDM "), RecordType.Name = "HR", RecordType.Name = "Payroll", RecordType.Name = "PTP/AP", RecordType.Name = "PTP/AP - PR/PO", RecordType.Name = "RTR", RecordType.Name = "T&E" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are restricted from making this change. Please reach out to the System Administrator if you believe you are seeing this message in error.
